overview:
Sterling Wilson is the President and CEO at Ground Truth.

Prior to taking the helm at Ground Truth, Sterling was president and a member of the board of directors of Qpass, a market-leading digital commerce infrastructure company. At Qpass, he was responsible for managing the company as it grew from a venture-backed start-up to a company with 300 international employees and leading its sale to Amdocs (NYSE: DOX) for $300 million.

Prior to Qpass, Sterling was chief financial officer and executive vice president of operations at Concur Technologies (NASDAQ: CNQR), a market leader in SaaS expense report and travel management software. During his tenure, Concur expanded to more than 400 employees in 17 domestic and four international offices. He managed Concurâ€™s IPO and secondary offering and helped transition the company from a shrink-wrap software company, to a client-server company, and ultimately to an Internet company.

Sterling holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in accounting from California State University at Bakersfield.
